location.address: 461 Rua Alfredo Allen

name: GDG - Android Sessions - #1 XING
description: The goal of this event is to gather the Android community in Porto, helping everyone to get up to date and to know Android a little bit better. We'll share knowledge and experience about the Android ecosystem. This is the #1 Android Session, and it will be hosted in collaboration with XING (https://www.xing.com/) and they'll share with us their experience. ‚Ä¢ So, what's the plan here? 18:30 - Welcome snacks!18:50 - Language abuse & Unreadability - Yahya Bayramoƒülu, XING19:25 - How to dagger 2.15 - Pedro Gl√≥ria20:00 - That's all folks! ‚Ä¢ Should I bring anything?There is no need to bring anything, but if you have something cool to show you can bring it and share it with us! ‚Ä¢ Important stuff!If you are joining, please book it here. We have limited sitting. AlsoJoin GDG Porto on Slack https://gdgporto.slack.com/ and check out the #dev-android channel! If you need an invite please ping us at [masked] ‚Ä¢ About the speakers ## Yahya Bayramoƒülu Yahya Bayramoƒülu is a passionate Android Developer from Turkey and currently working at XING located in Hamburg/Germany. He has been developing for Android Platform since 2012, and he is constantly adapting himself to the platform changes and requirements and always following up the new cool things on industry. https://github.com/yayaahttps://www.xing.com/profile/Yahya_BAYRAMOGLUhttps://twitter.com/YahyaBayramoglu ## Pedro Gl√≥ria Hello, I'm Pedro an Android developer. I love tech, games, series and dogs. I've been programming in android for over 3 years where I've been in companies like Maily, a message/drawing app for kids, Bliss where I've worked with some major Portuguese companies and now at Farfetch. During my earlier programming days I've started with frontend where I've learned AngularJs, but Android is my passion. My life motto is Programmer at day. Progamer at night ! https://www.linkedin.com/in/pedro-gl%C3%B3ria-b269a871/https://github.com/Peddro

location.name: Blip
location.address: Avenida Camilo, n¬∫ 94, 4300-095

name: [0x6A] - The Meet
description: [0x6A] - The Meet With the Easter bunny just around the corner, there seems to be no better time to hunt down all those "easter eggs" in our CPUs. Be on the grid and don't miss the chance to keep yourself updated with the latest InfoSec headlines and hot topics such as the impact of the GDPR. Spread the word and join us for our next InfoSec egg hunt. As usual, we ask you for some help with the logistics. Be sure to RSVP yes only when you are 100% sure you can attend. Thanks in advance. In the meantime, you can join our Slack chat (https://oposec.herokuapp.com/) to discuss all kind of hackish stuff and, of course, interact with others members. Hope to see you soon. [Goals] Learn something new, get to know other g33ks, build an information security community/group in the Porto area and, the most important thing, have fun. [Agenda] - Who are you? (New participants small introduction)- Microarchitectural bugs are everywhere (EN/PT) by Duarte Monteiro (@d0kt0r)- GDPR: the impact on how we develop and maintain our services (EN/PT) by Ricardo Castro* Social drinks on the house üòâ [Challenge] URL: http://challenge.davidepaalte.x10host.com/If you have a solution talk to @davidepaalte.

description: Commit Porto is a tech conference to be held in Porto, bringing together professionals from different areas talking about their experience tackling challenges in software development with the latest technologies! It will be an excellent opportunity for knowledge sharing and inherently promote Porto as a vibrant and dynamic city for technology-based companies.
